授業目的: This course introduces students to academic analysis through reading, discussion, and writing.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will have gained a general understanding of academic analysis.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回:
All classes are face-to-face.
For details, please refer to section below.
トピック.授業計画1: In this semester we will discuss this book: Peter Singer, "The Most Good You Can Do." The book is downloadable free online. Please search and download it yourself.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to upload a 350-word essay to LUNA on the book every week. The first 100 words should be given to summarizing the reading, while the next 250 should be for commenting. At the end of the semester, there is a 1500-word review article on the book.
